column4: Does anyone know how to get vim colorschemes to work with gnome-terminal? They were in gvim, but not with the "vim" command. I tried "export TERM="xterm-color"" already.
I mean they *work* in gvim
What's the difference between mysql-client and mysql-server?
do apt-cache show mysql-client | grep Depends (and then do the same for server, if they have the same dependencies then they are likely meta packages that install the same thing)
use sudo and modify it from cli
Well I did umount it and chown to "michael", but it just goes back after restart...
mount it the real way with /etc/fstab
I have an entry in fstab and I looked at the ubuntu wiki, but I couldn't find anything about permissions for mounting... (note: diskmounter just adds it to fstab and it's done)
How do I change the mount permissions?
what is the filesystem
vfat
add the following options, fmask=111,dmask=000
Ok, restarting, one second...
Thanks
how can I program crash after you try to start it
does not try imply that you don't
The process successfully loads, then reads the config, then fails/crashes
how can I program crash :) Any idea how to fix the problem?
there is a difference between a typo and a statement that is confusingly ambiguous
Please allow me to rephrase.
depends if it shows up or not when you hit it, sometimes keys don't
